title: Button, late 18th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Circular medallion in the style of Wedgwood Jasperware; showing open flower (four petals) surrounded by ring of dots and ring of bell flowers; blue on white.

On card 4

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Stoneware. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-14.
